patthana8.54:1.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṃkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.54:2.1: Naasaṃkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭho ceva nano ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.54:3.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṃkiliṭṭhañca naasaṃkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
